responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "C0A3922C4F825623C5D313B7191F1CEF", "The Ramkin have taken an interest in a Ceremonial Pool in one of the caverns along the river. None of ours know what the purpose of that pool is, but the monsters seem fascinated by it. If you could plumb the depths of that mystery, I\'m sure it\'d be of interest at Bonfire.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_MalaeKelori_9_Response
